property.name: Submarines Defending May Submerge Or Retreat
Two HitPoint Units Require Repair Facilities
Unplaced units live when not placed
Units Can Be Destroyed Instead Of Captured
notes
property.value:
A North Africa World War II game. This is the base scenario.
Each side has multiple tiers of victory possible to them:
Axis:
-Instant - Control Cairo or kill all Allied Pieces.
-Major - At the end of Round 13, control Tobruk and Mareth
-Minor - At the end of Round 13, control at least one of Tripoli and Algiers

Allies:
-Instant - Control Tunis or kill all Axis Pieces.
-Major - At the end of Round 13, control Tobruk and Tripoli
-Minor - At the end of Round 13, control Mareth
